title: 98/113/EC: Commission Decision of 28 January 1998 amending Decision 87/257/EEC on the list of establishments in the United States of America approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 January 1998 amending Decision 87/257/EEC on the list of establishments in the United States of America approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community (Text with EEA relevance) (98/113/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 87/257/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 January 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
